about_the_game:
A Mystical Puzzle Adventure Beyond Reality

Ved, an ordinary young man, receives a mysterious package containing an ancient map of the Himalayas. Following its trail, he discovers a hidden cave and a colossal cube of unknown origin. The moment he touches it, everything changes—Ved is transformed into a cube and transported into a surreal, enigmatic dimension where reality bends, and ancient powers lie dormant.

In this atmospheric puzzle-adventure, players must navigate a vast, cubic world filled with secrets, challenges, and hidden knowledge.

Gameplay Features:

🔷 Become the Cube – Control Ved in his transformed state, rolling and shifting through intricate environments where each side of the cube presents unique mechanics and abilities.

🔷 Solve Mind-Bending Puzzles – Manipulate the cubic world, activate ancient mechanisms, and harness elemental powers to overcome obstacles and unlock new paths.

🔷 Explore a Dynamic, Evolving World – Traverse six visually distinct chapters, each featuring environments that shift and evolve as Ved’s journey unfolds.

🔷 Master Elemental Abilities – Unlock powerful new skills that allow deeper exploration and more complex challenges as Ved gains knowledge of his transformation.

🔷 Unravel an Enigmatic Story – Inspired by Hindu mythology, the game weaves an emotional tale of self-discovery, mystery, and fate.

🔷 A Visually Transformative Experience – Begin in dark, ominous landscapes and gradually transition into bright, vibrant realms, mirroring Ved’s personal growth and the secrets he uncovers.

As Ved delves deeper into the mysteries of the cube, the world shifts, challenges intensify, and the truth behind his transformation is revealed.

Will you escape the cube’s grasp, or become one with its power?

Dare to enter VED: Journey Beyond the Cube. The path is yours to shape.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus / AMD Radeon Pro 560 / Apple M1 GPU
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: macOS-compatible sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 12 Monterey or later
  • Processor: Apple M1/M2
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1/M2 GPU / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: macOS-compatible sound card
